moves.name: Outrage
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

moves.name: Hyper Voice
moves.description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

moves.name: Tri Attack
moves.description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Dragon Rage
moves.description: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Dragon Breath
moves.description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Roar
moves.description: The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Slam
moves.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

moves.name: Dragon Pulse
moves.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

moves.name: Work Up
moves.description: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.

moves.name: Dragon Rush
moves.description: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly reduce its Speed stat.

moves.name: Hyper Voice
moves.description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

moves.name: Outrage
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.
